div.p: (A): Melting curve of ( 1), TLR2; (2), TLR4; (3) GAPDH cDNA amplification products. (B): Agarose gel electrophoresis of TLR2, TLR4 and GAPDH cDNA amplification products under UV light: (lane 1), Marker 100 bp + 3 kb DNA Ladder (Smobio. Taiwan); (Lane 2), TLR2 (182 bp); (Lane 3), TLR4 (392 bp); (Lane 4), GAPDH (419 bp).
